alert.note: Alert for Chouteau; Eastern Glacier; Eastern Pondera; Eastern Teton; Liberty; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 11:39PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Convective showers with gusty winds will impact portions of eastern Pondera, Liberty, northeastern Glacier, Toole, northeastern Teton and northwestern Chouteau Counties through 1230 AM MDT... At 1137 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty winds along a line extending from 18 miles northwest of Sunburst to 8 miles southwest of Shelby to 8 miles northeast of Fairfield. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shelby, Cut Bank, Conrad, Choteau, Chester, Valier, Sunburst, Dutton, Kevin, Lothair, Joplin, Brady, The Knees, Power, Sweet Grass, Carter, Oilmont, Tiber Dam, Santa Rita and Ferdig. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chouteau; Eastern Glacier; Eastern Pondera; Eastern Teton; Liberty; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Toole
